content: basic booties this pattern is to make a pair of simple basic stay-on booties the booties are worked in the round from the sole up to the cuff you only need to sew up a very small seam at the sole you can either make these booties using double pointed needles or using long circular needles with magic loop method if you are new to the magic loop here is a link to a very good tutorial http //www knittinghelp com/video/play/magic-loop sizes available newborn 6 months 12 months length of sole 3½ 4 4½ inch / 9 10 11 5 cm gauge 20 stitches = 4 in stockinette stitch needles & yarn us #6 / 4 0mm needles us #4 / 3 5mm needles 46 60 80 yards / 42 55 73 meters of dk weight yarn abbreviations and glossary k knit m1-r with left needle pick up strand between the last stitch worked and the next stitch on the left needle from back to front knit into it through front loop m1-l with left needle pick up strand between the last stitch worked and the next stitch on the left needle from front to back knit into it through back loop k2tog knit 2 stitches together ssk slip the next 2 stitches knit wise one by one then return both to left needle knit these 2 stitches together through back loop
